Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to verify the quotes attributed to Digvijaya Singh.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the quotes attributed to Digvijaya Singh are fake and being circulated to portray him as a terror sympathizer.
Problematic assumption: The assumption that the quotes attributed to Digvijaya Singh are true is problematic as there is no reliable evidence to support it.
Contradict fact: The quotes attributed to Digvijaya Singh contradict the fact that he denies making those statements.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the quotes attributed to Digvijaya Singh by suggesting that they are being widely circulated and used to portray him negatively.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any information or facts.
